briefdescription.para: Max appliable current before the robot shutdown.

detaileddescription.para: slider_positions_ is the position of the linear potentiometer. Can be used as a joystick input.

briefdescription.para: For reading the raw slider values from the serial port.
contact_sensors_ is contact sensors at each feet of teh quadruped.
This is the name of the network: Left column in ifconfig output.

detaileddescription.para: PC <- Ethernet/Wifi -> main board <- SPI -> Motor Board
This object contains the API compatible with the blmc_drivers and BLMCJointModule(s).

briefdescription.para: Reader for serial port to read arduino slider values.
These are the 6 motor boards of the robot.
motors_ are the objects allowing us to send motor commands and receive data.
sliders_ these are analogue input, typically from linear potentiometers.
Joint modules containing the driving system paramters.
Address the rotation direction of the motor.
If the physical estop is pressed or not.
Security margin on the saturation of the control.
Solo is the constructor of the class.
Initialize the robot by setting aligning the motors and calibrate the sensors to 0.
send_target_torques sends the target currents to the motors.
acquire_sensors acquire all available sensors, WARNING !!!! this method has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.
Calibrate the joints by moving to the next joint index position.

parameterdescription.para: This is the angle between the index and the zero pose.

simplesect.para: the max torque that has been hardcoded in the constructor of this class.

xrefdescription.para: Parametrize the maximum current via yaml or something else.

get_joint_positions
the joint angle of each module WARNING !!!! The method <acquire_sensors>"()" has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.

the target joint torques WARNING !!!! The method <acquire_sensors>"()" has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.
the position of the index of the encoders a the motor level WARNING !!!! The method <acquire_sensors>"()" has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.
the state of the contacts states WARNING !!!! The method <acquire_sensors>"()" has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.
the current sliders positions. WARNING !!!! The method <acquire_sensors>"()" has to be called prior to any getter to have up to date data.

briefdescription.para: Definition and drivers for the Solo12 robot.

detaileddescription.para: Mapping between the DOF and driver boards + motor ports: FL_HAA - motor board 0, motor port 0, motor index 0 FL_HFE - motor board 1, motor port 1, motor index 3 FL_KFE - motor board 1, motor port 0, motor index 2 FR_HAA - motor board 0, motor port 1, motor index 1 FR_HFE - motor board 2, motor port 1, motor index 5 FR_KFE - motor board 2, motor port 0, motor index 4 HL_HAA - motor board 3, motor port 0, motor index 6 HL_HFE - motor board 4, motor port 1, motor index 9 HL_KFE - motor board 4, motor port 0, motor index 8 HR_HAA - motor board 3, motor port 1, motor index 7 HR_HFE - motor board 5, motor port 1, motor index 11 HR_KFE - motor board 5, motor port 0, motor index 10
